blog.name: ao3feed-jonrya
blog.title: AO3feed-Jonrya
blog.description: An automated feed for Jon x Arya fics posted on AO3.

title: Longclaw
description:
by Writerwhowrites

Jon left four years ago, the scandal of her betrothed’s death and her unborn child raised many questions. Arya doesn’t believe what they say about her cousin.

“He dishonored the girl. She was with child, and when she heard that the prince had left, with no care for her or the babe he’d sired on her, she throw herself into the sea.”

Lord Forrester had come to Winterfell to demand a duel with Jon. “How dare he dishonor my precious daughter and then leave her as if she was nothing but a tavern wench?” he’d shouted for everyone to hear.

Father, Rodrik, Jon, Robb, Alyssa and probably Mother… (Those are the only ones who know the whole truth.) But Alyssa had killed herself a moon later, and Jon was gone, and father wouldn’t speak, and now Rodrik was also dead.

Words: 600, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin, A Song of Ice and Fire & Related Fandoms, Game of Thrones (TV)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M, Gen
  • Characters: Arya Stark, Robb Stark, Jon Snow, Brandon Stark, Ned Stark, Original House Stark Character(s), Catelyn Tully Stark, Dacey Mormont, Jorah Mormont, Mors “Crowfood” Umber, Domeric Bolton, Maester Luwin, Samwell Tarly, Direwolf | Direwolves
  • Relationships: Jon Snow/Arya Stark
  • Additional Tags: Torrhen Stark Never Knelt, The North and the Vale are called the Winter Kingdoms, Not Canon Compliant, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Jon Snow is a Stark, Jon Snow is called Jon Stark, The King in The North, King Ned Stark, Independent North, Implied/Referenced Suicide, no sibling incest, Jon Snow is Lyanna’s son, Catelyn Arryn Stark, Warging

tags: the house of black and white
summary: “I only came to find Jaqen H'ghar.” “I do not know this name.” Her heart sank. “He was from Lorath. His hair was white on one...
caption:
“I only came to find Jaqen H'ghar.”

“I do not know this name.”

Her heart sank. “He was from Lorath. His hair was white on one side and red on the other. He said he’d teach me secrets…” 

A Feast for Crows; George R. R. Martin

blog.name: stydialarke
blog.title: I think you look really beautiful when you cry.
blog.description: Expect episode reviews, book reviews, live blogging, and lots of gushing about ships. I will probably mostly post Bellarke or whichever of my shows is currently airing, but I am SUPER multifandom.

summary: Top five female characters (In no order)
title: Top five female characters (In no order)
body:
Lydia Martin, because beauty, brains, and brawn ftw. I preferred Allison at first, but by the time season three was over, Lydia had crept up on me so hard. She has character development for the books.

SO, I know I said “No order”, but, yeah… Hermione is my favorite. Oops. Shoutout to my girl for reminding me that it was okay to be a little nerdy as a child.

Arya Stark. It probably says something about me that my favorite and easily most relatable Game of Thrones character is a trained assassin bent on revenge, but we’re not going to read too much into it, okay? I’m perfectly normal!

Caroline. I’m actually super bitter over her ending and am still refusing to watch Legacies because I no longer trust Julie to handle characters I love. Lmao. 

Rebekah, because her character is so deep and underrated. She’s another one that crept up on me.

blog.name: buttercuparry
blog.title: Warm Winter Sun
blog.description: If a 12 year old has to save the world then so be it!

summary: But Arya would not leave until they found Yoren. They couldn't have killed him, she told herself, he was too hard and tough, and...
body:
You know what really gets to me? The fact that Arya went back to the burnt down holdfast to get Yoren bc she believed that he was still alive. Even after Hot Pie and Lommy told her that it was a foolish idea to go back bc of the risks of running into Lannister soldeirs, Arya went back without fearing for her life bc she didn’t want to leave Yoren behind. I think this just proves that Arya would try again and again, till the very last moment to save both her pack and her fellow men. I mean just think about the way she rushed to save her father during his execution!! In the same way she insisted on searching for Yoren in an attempt to save him:

But Arya would not leave until they found Yoren. They couldn’t have killed him, she told herself, he was too hard and tough, and a brother of the Night’s Watch besides. She said as much to Gendry as they searched among the corpses.

I think this line also reflects Arya’s age and innocence. She is afterall a little girl so it’s given that she would have certain ideas that would seem a bit rose-tinted. So it’s possible that she had hoped that the “hard” and “tough” Yoren was still alive. But of course all was for naught. Yoren died and yet again Arya was heartbroken. She was frustrated too bc Yoren promised her that he would take her home.

He was going to take me home, she thought as they dug the old man’s hole. There were too many dead to bury them all, but Yoren at least must have a grave, Arya had insisted. He was going to bring me safe to Winterfell, he promised. Part of her wanted to cry. The other part wanted to kick him.

I find the complexity of Arya’s character to be very humane. She has her anger, her frustration and her sadness. And yet above all she has her kindness and her gratitude too. A part of her was mad bc Yoren broke his promise and yet I think that another part of her was grateful to him for getting her out of KL and for protecting her in whatever way he could

summary: And he isn’t mentioned Jon as a Stark 👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽Starks final will disappointing us 🧐🧐🧐They Are Brother and sister but not Family....
body:
Isaac Hempstd Wright isn’t thinking that Starks can be Family again!

“No way. There’s no way the Starks can just go back to being a family again. They’re all just such different characters now. I mean, they were different to begin with, but still brothers and sisters. Now, Arya’s an assassin. Bran’s a tree wizard. And Sansa’s this conniving political mistress. So putting them back together again… I think it would just end up being disappointing. That’s why I don’t think it should happen—because people would go, ‘Oh. Oh no.’”

And he isn’t mentioned Jon as a Stark 👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽Starks final will disappointing us 🧐🧐🧐They Are Brother and sister but not Family. Jon will travel to the south with Dany as Targaryen. Probably Arya Travels with them and became queensguard as she always dreamed. Sansa will die or stay alone in North.

blog.name: nobodysuspectsthebutterfly

blog.description:
Hey, you can call me Mindset, or Butterfly.
I like: Comics, ASOIAF, music, art, books, sf & fantasy, butterflies, birds, pretty rocks, and many other things. See my sidebar tags and links for more details.
I help mod: ASOIAF University and A Song of Theories.
Note to ASOIAF fandom followers: I've read all the books, and rarely if ever cut for spoilers, sorry. Please check my FAQ and the other links on my sidebar for more info.

tags: wolf and dog roadtrip of doom
summary: Are you a ship only Hound and Sansa or too Hound and Arya? I really like the relationship Arya and Hound, and how do you feel...
question: Are you a ship only Hound and Sansa or too Hound and Arya? I really like the relationship Arya and Hound, and how do you feel about this?
answer: I only romantically ‘ship Sandor and Sansa. But I do very much like Sandor and Arya’s (platonic) relationship, though, I wouldn’t have a tag for it otherwise. If you go way back in that tag (or if you’re not on mobile and thus can add /chrono to the end of the link to put the posts in reverse order), you’ll run into more of my meta posts on the subject. Any specific questions, just let me know.

summary: Are there any good artists on tumblr who actually draw Arya with a long face? Please let me know cause I’d love to see it! I...
question: Are there any good artists on tumblr who actually draw Arya with a long face? Please let me know cause I’d love to see it! I guess I’ve never seen a good >canon< Arya art
answer:
Artists on tumblr?

  • @icesalamander does sometimes – not often in her more simplistic (but still lovely) drawings, but in the more detailed ones, like this one.
  • @mustamirri always does wonderful canon everybody, and here’s her Arya tag
  • @sabotensan has the loveliest Arya depictions
  • @shebsart is another with canon everybody including Arya
  • @rosenrot6 has a super-cute Arya (and the other Starks too)
  • @mrsjadecurtiss always does an excellent long-faced Arya (though there’s more than art in that tag sorry)
  • @aqvarelles does a lovely fierce Arya (and dang some of those WIPs are new to me)
  • @toweringarts has such a neat Stark sisters AU going, but here’s her Arya tag on its own
  • @velvetmirrors has so many gorgeous Arya depictions, often animated
  • @goldseven, Jenny Dolfen, is on tumblr (though more of her work is on her own blog) – and you can see her canon Arya here (there’s another one with Old Nan but it only shows Arya from the back)
  • @mathiaarkoniel has the most beautiful canon Stark girls and Cat

And I’m sure there are many many more lovely canon Arya artists out there on tumblr – this is just a sampling from the first 10 pages or so of my Arya art tag. Hope that helps!

blog.name: coolkarmact
blog.title: The Comedian
blog.description: In the end, we're all satisfied. And you're set free.

text:
We are not now that strength which in old days
Moved earth and heaven, that which we are, we are;
One equal temper of heroic hearts,
Made weak by time and fate, but strong in will
To strive, to seek, to find, and not to yield.
source:
Ulysses, by Alfred Lord Tennyson

I am re-watching Skyfall and the scene where the last few lines of Ulysses are being recited by M gives some strong Stark siblings vibes.

Also, the title track of Skyfall would make for a great trailer song for GOT season 8!

reblog.comment:

blog.name: sansadanvers
blog.title: Wolves are supposed to be brave, aren’t they?

body:
Just thinking out loud ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

This has most likely been talked about, but has anyone considered Arya Stark as an Azor Ahai candidate? I mean hey, there are so many characters that fit the Azor Ahai mold so why not her too? My reasoning is, if she does indeed kill Lady Stoneheart, her mother who she loved more than anything, LS will be her Nissa Nissa, and Needle will be Lightbringer? I apologize since this most likely has been discussed before, but I recently thought of this after reading Brienne’s chapters in AFFC.
